sources.name: sources
sources.title: Resources & Sources
sources.description: Useful resources for pixel art creation, wplace.live community, and related tools.

categories.title: WPlace.live Community
categories.description: Official resources and community links for wplace.live collaborative pixel art platform.

items.title: WPlace.live
items.description: The main collaborative pixel art platform where you can place your converted artwork.

items.title: WPlace Discord
items.description: Join the community Discord server to connect with other pixel artists and get help.

items.title: WPlace Reddit
items.description: Community discussions, artwork showcases, and tips on Reddit.

categories.title: Pixel Art Tools & Resources
categories.description: Additional tools and resources for creating and editing pixel art.

items.title: Aseprite
items.description: Professional pixel art tool for creating sprites and animations.

items.title: Piskel
items.description: Free online pixel art and animated sprite editor.

items.title: Lospec Palette List
items.description: Curated list of pixel art color palettes for your projects.

items.title: Pixel Art Tutorials
items.description: Comprehensive tutorials for learning pixel art techniques.

categories.title: Development & Code
categories.description: Open source projects and development resources related to pixel art and collaborative platforms.

items.title: Canvas API Documentation
items.description: MDN documentation for HTML5 Canvas API used in pixel art manipulation.

items.title: Image Processing Libraries
items.description: JavaScript libraries for image processing and pixel manipulation.

items.title: Pixel Art Algorithms
items.description: Research and algorithms for pixel art generation and scaling.

categories.title: Learning Resources
categories.description: Educational content for improving your pixel art skills and understanding collaborative art.

items.title: Pixel Art Academy
items.description: Online courses and tutorials for mastering pixel art creation.

items.title: Color Theory Guide
items.description: Understanding color theory for better pixel art color choices.

items.title: Collaborative Art History
items.description: Learn about the history and evolution of collaborative digital art.
